description: Nginx Ingress Controller via Prometheus Metrics Dashboard created for DevOps Nirvana @ https://github.com/DevOps-Nirvana

panels.description: This is the total number of requests made in this period (top-right period selected)

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s]))

panels.title: Requests (period)

panels.description:
This is the percentage of successful requests  made in this period (top-right period selected)

NOTE: Ignoring 404s in this metric, since a  404 is a normal response for errant requests
panels.title: % Success (period)

panels.description: This is the number of successful requests made in this period (top-right period selected).  Successful being 1xx or 2xx by the standard HTTP definition.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"(1|2).*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s])) or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 1/2xx (period)

panels.description: This is the number of 3xx requests made in this period (top-right period selected).

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"3.*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s]))  or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 3xx (period)

panels.description: This is the number of 4xx requests  made in this period (top-right period selected).

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"4.*",  controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s]))  or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 4xx (period)

panels.description: This is the number of 5xx requests made in this period (top-right period selected).

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{status=~"5.*", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s]))  or vector(0)

panels.title: HTTP 5xx (period)

panels.description: This is a total number of requests broken down by the ingress.  This can help get a sense of scale in relation to each other.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s])) by (ingress)

panels.title: HTTP Requests / Ingress

panels.description: Average rate of incoming requests per second over the last 2 minutes

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests[$__range]))

panels.title: Average rate of increase RPS (2m)

panels.description:
The breakdown of the various HTTP status codes of the requests handled within' this period that matches the variables chosen above.

This chart helps notice and dive into which service is having failures and of what kind.

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[${__range_s}s])) by (status)

panels.title: HTTP Status Codes

panels.description:
This graph can help assess and help us meet SLA requirements as far as the responsive time of our services.

For a more detailed latency graph broken out by ingress please open the closed tab at the bottom because it is very CPU intensive.
panels.title: Latency (Average Percentiles)

panels.description:
This graph can help assess and help us meet SLA requirements as far as the responsive time of our services.

For a more detailed latency graph broken out by ingress please open the closed tab at the bottom because it is very CPU intensive.
panels.title: Latency Heatmap

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{status!="404",status!="500", controller_class=~"$controller_class", ingress=~"$ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", controller_pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (le, ingress))

title: Kubernetes Nginx Ingress Prometheus NextGen
